description:
I modified a little bit the solo in measures 228 and 229 because that's what I'm hearing :)

title: Gula

description: changed a few fingering to keep it consistent and avoid some ridiculous stretches, also added palm mutes where it makes sense. According to Phil's website they play in 6 string B standard, but changing that would require rewriting most of the song which would take a while.
title: Gula

description: Added Bass and Complete Drum Track
